subject: Message From Mr. Sarata KONE -THIAM Foreign Remittance Director, UBA BANK COTE D’IVOIRE
body:
Mr. Sarata KONE -THIAM
Foreign Remittance Director,
UBA BANK COTE D’IVOIRE
Banque internationale pour l'Afrique occidentale Côte d'Ivoire
UBA GROUP - COTE D’IVOIRE.
Email: ubafinancialinstitute2019@gmail.com
Tell:  +225 07 68 522 164
Adresse géo: 8-10,avenue Joseph Anoma Plateau Abidjan Côte d'Ivoire


Date. 19_02_2024

Attn. Rebeca Louise


We The UBA Bank Has Been Ordered Or Instructed By The United Nation To
Deliver Your Atm Card Been The Chosen Bank In West Africa, As Soon As The
Motherlities Is Been Met In Order To Get It Delivered To Your Home Mailing
Address As Been Provided Safely By You

The United Nation Under The Control Monitoring Unit Of Mrs MaryJohnson Has
Ordered Us The UBA Bank To Deliver This Very Atm Card to you for your
compensation , it was an International Satisfied Atm Card from The UBA Bank
Can Be Withdrawn  In Any Of The Local Banks In Your
Country.

Mind You, The ATM CARD Is Empty No cash In It For Now Until It Gets To Your
Care In Your Home Mailing Address Then The United Nation Will Now Released
The PIN CODE Of The ATM CARD To You For Security Reason

Then You Can Go To Any Local Bank In Your Country There And Start Making
Withdrawal.

But Can Only Withdraw $2500 Per Day From The ATM CARD ok

Here Are The Courier Services  That  Will Make The Post Delivery For Safe
Deliverance Of The ATM CARD To Your Home Mailing Address And
Monitored By The United Nation Diplomatic Agent Also.

(1) DHL...$350      2 Days To Reach Your Home


I am looking forward to hear from you as soon as possible to enable the Atm
Card to be Despatched As Instructed To Your Home Mailing
Address

If Confirmed Ok By You, You Can Easily Send It Down Through Either RIA
MONEY TRANSFER, OR MONEYGRAM Or Better Still WESTER UNION. It Depends On
Which Of These Agents Are Closer To Your Residence.

Below Is The Address And Name To Make The Sending Across Easily And
Also The Specimen Of The ATM CARD.

Country.. Côte D'ivoire
City. Abidjan
Receiver's Name. LAURA YOUNG
Test Question. Peace
Answer. Harmony
Mtcn Information Numbers.
Amount Sent.
Best Regards

Mr. Sarata KONE -THIAM
Foreign Remittance Director,
UBA BANK COTE D’IVOIRE

subject: Re: Message From Mr. Sarata KONE -THIAM Foreign Remittance Director, UBA BANK COTE D’IVOIRE
body:
Hello Mr. Sarata KONE,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite interesting to hear about this ATM card from the UBA Bank, under the control of the United Nations. I must say, it's a unique situation.

I'm curious though, why was my name selected for this? And how did the United Nations come to be involved in this process? 

Also, could you please explain more about how the ATM card works? You mentioned that it is currently empty and will only have funds once it reaches me. How does that work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

ATTN. REBECA  LOIUSE, With All Due Respect, The Reason Why The ATM CARD Is
Empty Is Because We Do Not Want Any Excuses Of Lossing The ATM CARD From
The ¨Pört Of Entering Ito Your Country After Declaration Of The Content In
The ATM CARD. This Is Just For Security Reasons. If Then The ATM CARD Gets
To Ist Beneficiary, The Uba Bank Will Now Credit The $750,000Usd Into It
For Confirmation Of Szfely Arrival Of The AT CARD To The Beneficiary

So Go Ahead And Make The Neccasry Payment To Enable Us Make The Delivery Of
Your ATM CARD To Its Final Destination In Your Home Mailing Address
Best Regards

Mr. Sarata KONE -THIAM

Foreign Remittance Director,
UBA BANK COTE D’IVOIRE

body:

I'm also curious about the courier services. You mentioned DHL - are there any other options available? And what are the costs associated with each of these services?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: Message From Mr. Sarata KONE -THIAM Foreign Remittance Director, UBA BANK COTE D’IVOIRE
body:
Hello Mr. Sarata KONE,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite exciting to hear about this ATM card from the UBA Bank and the United Nations. I must say, it's not every day that one receives such news.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind me asking. You mentioned that the ATM card is currently empty and will only be loaded once it reaches me. Could you please explain why this is so? 

Also, could you provide more information about these courier services? How can I be sure that they are reliable and my ATM card will reach me safely?

Lastly, regarding the payment methods - RIA MONEY TRANSFER, MONEYGRAM or WESTERN UNION - could you please provide more details on how these work? I'm not very familiar with them.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca
